title: EverQuest Updated Textures.rar
description:
EverQuest Updated Textures

Includes:
EverQuest Classic Retexture
Kunark Retexture
Velious Retexture

These textures were first available with the Shadows of Luclin expansion for EverQuest.  They completely retexture the old EQ world, as well as Kunark and Velious.  It makes a HUGE difference and things look much better with them.  After realizing that EverQuest Titanium does not come with the updated textures (and I couldn&#039;t find a patch elsewhere), I decided to rip them from my Shadows of Luclin CD&#039;s.

TO USE:

Just unrar into your EverQuest directory, overwriting all existing files.  

There shouldn&#039;t be any problems with these files and they seem to work just fine for me, but please use at your own risk.

Enjoy!
